verbs.description: [ARG0: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [V: said] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump is unlikely to keep the US in the Iran nuclear deal past the next deadline to certify the deal in May.]
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said that [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: unlikely to keep the US in the Iran nuclear deal past the next deadline to certify the deal in May.]
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is unlikely to [V: keep] [ARG1: the US] [ARG2: in the Iran nuclear deal] past the next deadline to certify the deal in May.
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said that President Donald Trump is unlikely to keep the US in the Iran nuclear deal past the next deadline to [V: certify] [ARG1: the deal] [ARGM-TMP: in] May.
